dom_changes.description: Rebranded page from 'Profile Settings' to 'Account Settings' across metadata and primary heading for better alignment with system terminology.
Refactored user identity fields: 'Display Name' (#display-name) was replaced with 'Full Name' (#full-name) to support formal naming conventions.
Transitioned 'Bio' field to 'About Me' and converted the visual hint (max 160 characters) into a hard 'maxlength' constraint on the input itself.
Removed legacy hint text container as character limits are now enforced at the browser level via input attributes.
Updated primary action button ID and text (#save-btn / 'Save' to #update-btn / 'Update') to reflect the asynchronous nature of the account sync process.

test_impact_analysis: CRITICAL: All E2E selectors targeting '#save-btn', '#display-name', and '#bio' will break immediately following this deployment.
FUNCTIONAL: Character limit testing must change from visual verification of a hint message to functional verification of input truncation/prevention.
VISUAL: Removing the '.hint' container will impact the vertical spacing and alignment of the primary card component.
LOCALIZATION: Title and header text updates require corresponding updates in translation files to prevent fallback 'unknown' keys.
new_tests_recommended: Add validation test to confirm the input field strictly prevents users from entering more than 160 characters.
Verify that screen readers correctly announce the new 'Full Name' and 'About Me' labels in the revised tab order.
Update standard page header smoke tests to verify the new 'Account Settings' branding.
Regression test the submission flow using the new '#update-btn' selector.
